title: Google Keyword Planner integration for Digistore24
description: Batch import Google Keyword Planner data for 16K+ keywords to get top-of-page bids, competition index, and volume comparison with SimilarWeb data. Currently debugging 400 errors from API.

comments.author: kennyhyder
comments.text: Batch import running: 1108 batches of 15 keywords each. Script has retry logic for rate limits (HTTP 429). Progress is being saved every 100 batches. Import will add Google data: annual_volume, competition, competition_index, low/high_top_of_page_bid to each keyword.

comments.author: kennyhyder
comments.text: Batch import at 110/1108 (~10%). Keyword tool UI updated with Google Bid column - deployed to production. Data will be visible once import completes.

comments.author: kennyhyder
comments.text: Batch import COMPLETE! 14,577 keywords (88%) now have Google data: annual volume, competition level/index, top-of-page bid range. Data deployed to production. Keyword tool now shows Google Bid column with color-coded competition.

title: Digistore24 PPC Keyword Analysis Tool
description: Built interactive keyword analysis tool at /clients/digistore24/keyword-tool.html with 16,616 keywords from SimilarWeb competitor data (awin, samcart, clickbank, maxweb). Features: sortable/filterable table, auto-categorization, CSV export, pivot table showing brand overlap.
